answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Gregory, 
I hope you have been receiving responses to your member's survey.  In addition I would suggest your member check out the City of Champaign's  Report to City Council on Parking and Parking Plans which includes some information on city owned and operated lots and garages. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/7366
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: Roderick Wood
answers.text:
Check with the City of Beverly Hills, CA they have multiple facilities with about 6,000 city owned parking spaces.  Those facilities include public parking and also commercial lease space which makes the city a fair  profit to underwrite the parking operations.  The parking manager there was Chad Lynn, he may have been promoted since I retired.

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I'm working on a project for a member on parking garages. I’m looking to see how many local governments manage parking garages.  If you have a parking garage, please fill out this short survey to help answer a couple questions:
https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/GWTQNDN
Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
title: Parking Garages
